price: 88. Waadna ogaan doontaan warkiisa muddo yar kaddib14.
footnotes: 14. Ogaanshaha run ahaanta waxa ku soo arooray Qur’aanka sida inuu Alle u gargaari doono mu’miniinta, iyo wararka la xidhiidha Aakhirada.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
